description:
A mysterious insect man, Sarutobi Sasuke, appears in Edo.  The city is in danger but the City Patrol Group is nowhere to be found.  The Shrine and Samurai House patrol groups fight back, but are overwhelmed.  Just when everything seems lost to his speedy attacks...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Insect!? Man!? A Mysterious Enemy Attacks!
Mushi!? Hito!? Nazo no Teki, Shuurai!
蟲!? 人!? 謎の敵, 襲来!
